Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: 集会所
Entry.EnglishText: Meeting House

Entry.JapaneseText: 何者だ……なぜオレの 名前を知っている……
Entry.EnglishText: Who are you...and how do you know my name...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 心配しなくていいよ。 ボクたちは仲間さ。 こっちへ来て話を 聞いてくれないかな？
Entry.EnglishText: No need to worry, we're your pals! Why don't you come over here and hear what we have to say?

Entry.JapaneseText: 話す事など何もない。 帰れ……
Entry.EnglishText: There's nothing to talk about. Get out...
Entry.Notes: hear me out. maybe "get lost" would work better instead of get out? -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: そうかなぁ。 ボクたちなら、キミの力に なれると思うんだけど。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, that's too bad... We were thinking we could help you.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえに何ができる？ 何も知らないくせに……
Entry.EnglishText: How could you possibly help? You know nothing about me...

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクはキミ以上にキミのコトを知ってる。 キミの疑問の「答」を知っている。
Entry.EnglishText: We know you better than you know yourself. And we know the answer to your problem.
Entry.Notes: maybeeee "We have the solution to your problem." sounds better? -dragon

Entry.JapaneseText: ふざけるな。 何が「答」だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, right. What <Italic>answer</Italic>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 話をしようよ、<Veigue>。 キミが来ないなら、 ボクがそっちへ行くからさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hear us out, <Veigue>. If you won't come over here, then I'll make my way over to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: フォルスの制御は できるようだな。
Entry.EnglishText: He appears to have control over his Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、想像以上だネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, and even better than expected.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレにかまうな。 次は加減しない。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't test me. Next time I won't hold back.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ言ってるんですけど？
Entry.EnglishText: So that's how it's gonna be, huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: 手荒なマネはしたくなかったが、 仕方あるまい。
Entry.EnglishText: I would have preferred not to use violence, but we have no choice.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……みたいだね。 で、条件は？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Guess you're right. Well, how should I go about this?

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>フォルスなし、 目標を傷つけずに<nmb:3C>秒だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Disarm the target without harming him or using Force within <nmb:3C> seconds.

Entry.JapaneseText: ひえー！ キビシイなぁー！
Entry.EnglishText: Jeez! Talk about strict!

Entry.JapaneseText: できないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Can you not do it?

Entry.JapaneseText: できないと思う？
Entry.EnglishText: Do YOU think I can't?

Entry.JapaneseText: 質問に質問で返すのは 感心せんな。
Entry.EnglishText: It's disrespectful to answer a question with another question.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何を話している！ さっさと帰……
Entry.EnglishText: Enough of your talk! Get out of—!?

Entry.JapaneseText: やめるなら今のうちだよ、 <Veigue>？
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you think you should knock that off, <Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ふざけるな!!
Entry.EnglishText: Go to hell!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
